ygData.subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: New to EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree that the last expansion was more than worth the extra money. Most have a hard time making money to than spend 1/2 on going here and there for
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree that the last expansion was more than worth the extra
money. Most have a hard time making money to than spend 1/2 on going
here and there for whatever reasons (guild raids, to lvl, to farm for
more pp, etc.)... I still think my favorite aspect is changing the
hair, eyes, and colors... My woodelf and necro look damn good if you
ask me. Now, on top of being a chick playing females characters I can
get more into the roleplaying aspect since I know what I look like!!

._.-~*~-.Beverly R.-~*~-._.-~*~-._

--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, PsyKo
<sibilant_ghost@y...> wrote:
> Planes of Power is a very valuable asset for a
> starting character. I never had it and will be
> starting EQ again in the next few months, but Before
> PoP came out you had to pay massive amounts of
> platinum to get teleported anywhere. With a lot of
> the newbie quest armor you also have to get rare
> pieces which will be easier to handle if you can get
> to cities across the map without having to cross
> through the lvl 30+ areas to get there. When I was a
> newbie I tried to cross the continent and got stuck in
> the Arena at lvl 9 and was bound (don't ask) there and
> couldn't get out... It was pure luck after 6 hours
> someone walked into the lake area.. Well Good Luck,
> but if your still not sure just stick with the
> original til you get your levels up.
>
> PsyKo
> 46 Barb War (ret.)
